full_summary:
**Office Furniture Tender**
=====================================

### Notice Information

* **Reference:** cb-166-48944761
* **Publication Date:** 2024-11-20
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-12-04T16:00:00
* **Tender Status:** Open

### Purchasing Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Administrative Tribunals Support Service Canada (ATSSC)
* **Contact Information:**
  * Name: Veronica Ross
  * Email: veronica.ross@tribunal.gc.ca
  * Phone: (343) 596-7267
* **Address:** 240 Sparks St., Ottawa, ON K1A 0X8
* **Country:** Canada

### Tender Description

Administrative Tribunals Support Service Canada (ATSSC) seeks the supply and delivery of office furniture to 240 Sparks Street, Ottawa, ON. Installation will take place in two phases: Phase 1 by March 31, 2025, and Phase 2 to be determined before March 31, 2026.

This notice is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/D. The requirement falls under Product Categories 1 (Workstation Systems), 2 (Work Surface Products), and 6 (Collaborative Products) of the SA.

### Important Information

* **Floor Plans:** Available upon request from atsscbidreceiving-receptiondesoumissionscdata@tribunal.gc.ca
* **Security Requirement:** None

### Trade Agreements and Regions

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions:** National Capital Region (NCR) and Canada
